# LCpackg <img src='man/figures/logo.png' align="right" height="90.5" />

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of LCpackg is to have a try following Antoine's talk on 14th of April, 2020

## Installation

You can install the released version of LCpackg from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rempart/LCpackg")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(LCpackg)
## basic example code
```



```{r printthedate}
printdate()
```
